branchCategory.name: Floating Joints
branchCategory.description: <p>Floating joints can absorb any "off-centering" or "loss of parallel accuracy" between the cylinder and the driven body.  Because of this, centering is unnecessary, installation time is drastically reduced, and a high level of machining accuracy is unnecessary.  These are made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing.</p>

branchItem.name: 90-JA, Floating Joint, Standard
branchItem.description: <p>The floating joint series 90-JA can absorb any "off-centering" or  "loss of parallel accuracy" between the cylinder  and the driven body.  Because of this, centering is unnecessary, installation time is drastically reduced, and a high level of machining accuracy is unnecessary. 90-JA is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing.</p>

branchItem.name: 90-JB, Floating Joint for Compact Cylinders, Material Restriction
branchItem.description: <p>The compact floating joint series 90-JB can absorb any "off-centering" or  "loss of parallel accuracy" between the cylinder  and the driven body.  Because of this, centering is unnecessary, installation time is drastically reduced, and a high level of machining accuracy is unnecessary. 90-JB is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing.</p>

branchItem.name: 90-JS, Floating Joint, Stainless Steel
branchItem.description: <p>Floating joint series 90-JS is made of stainless steel and used to increase corrosion resistance. JS uses a dust cover made of fluoro rubber or  silicon rubber and is shaped to prevent residual liquid, therefore sealing is improved.  Overall length as well as maximum tension and compression are the same as standard series JA. 90-JS is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing.</p>
